metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.html: Learn More

content.text: Start learning Front-end with the W3Schools program and lay the foundations of your Web Development skills. This program is a great foundation for you that wants to get started with Front-end Development. It covers HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
content.html: Start learning Front-end with the W3Schools program and lay the foundations of your Web Development skills. This program is a great foundation for you that wants to get started with Front-end Development. It covers HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

content.text: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages. With HTML you can create your own Website.
content.html: HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages. With HTML you can create your own Website.

content.text: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document. CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.
content.html: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document. CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.

content.text: JavaScript is the programming language of the Web.
content.html: JavaScript is the programming language of the Web.

content.text: This is a structured and interactive version of the w3schools HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Tutorials together with the W3schools certification.
content.html: This is a structured and interactive version of the w3schools HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Tutorials together with the W3schools certification.

content.text: The program is a set of self-paced courses with text based modules, practical interactive examples and exercises to check your understanding as you progress. Complete the modules and the final certification exams to get the w3schools certification.
content.html: The program is a set of self-paced courses with text based modules, practical interactive examples and exercises to check your understanding as you progress. Complete the modules and the final certification exams to get the w3schools certification.

content.text: You get sharable certificates that can be added to your CV, Resume or LinkedIn.
content.html: You get sharable certificates that can be added to your CV, Resume or LinkedIn.

links.text: Check out what it looks like in this example!

content.text: Check out what it looks like in this example!
content.html: Check out what it looks like in this example!

content.text: Three Reasons to Join the Program
The training content is built to be easy to understand.
Document your skills and knowledge with acknowledged certifications.
No deadlines. Study at your own pace.

content.html: Learn More

content.text: Enroll by paying the enrollment fee and gain access to the course and final exam. There is no deadline to take the exam. All questions in the exam are based on W3Schools content.
content.html: Enroll by paying the enrollment fee and gain access to the course and final exam. There is no deadline to take the exam. All questions in the exam are based on W3Schools content.

content.text: Step 2. Complete the course learning modules
The courses are self-paced with text based modules, practical interactive examples and exercises to check your understanding as you progress. Complete the learning modules to unlock the final exam.
content.html: The courses are self-paced with text based modules, practical interactive examples and exercises to check your understanding as you progress. Complete the learning modules to unlock the final exam.

content.text: The exams are taken at the end of each course after finishing the course learning modules. Immediately after completing the exam, you will be informed of your score and of your pass/fail status. You will get three attempts to pass each exam. You can use the new attempts to improve your score. The best result of the attempts will count.
content.html: The exams are taken at the end of each course after finishing the course learning modules. Immediately after completing the exam, you will be informed of your score and of your pass/fail status. You will get three attempts to pass each exam. You can use the new attempts to improve your score. The best result of the attempts will count.

content.text: Pass the exams and get your certifications and your Certified Developer titles! Each certificate gets a unique link that can be shared with others. Validate your certificates with a link or a QR code.
content.html: Pass the exams and get your certifications and your Certified Developer titles! Each certificate gets a unique link that can be shared with others. Validate your certificates with a link or a QR code.
Learn More
